content.description: Book this and <strong>save 100% on your flight</strong>
content.title: Unreal Deal
content.legal: Over 271,000 hotels and 400 airlines compete for your business every day. When you book a flight and hotel together, we negotiate incredible deals and pass the savings on to you. The savings can be so great they cover the cost of your airfare.

hotel-0.name: The Cosmopolitan Of Las Vegas
hotel-0.shortDescription: Set in the center of the Strip, this unique resort provides an enchanting destination amid the attractions of Las Vegas. The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas is less than 5 miles from McCarran International Airport.

promotion.description: Book now and save (on select nights)

hotel-1.name: happy_room
hotel-1.shortDescription: This all-suite resort and casino on the Las Vegas Strip is a short drive from Fashion Show Mall, the convention center,  Downtown, and McCarran Airport.

hotel-2.name: Bellagio
hotel-2.shortDescription: About 1,000 fountains dance to music and light in front of this European-style hotel set along the Las Vegas Strip, next to CityCenter and a tram ride away from Crystals Retail & Entertainment.
hotel-2.roomRatePlanDescription: Resort Queen Room - $120 Resort Credit Per Stay - RCJL17

hotel-3.name: ARIA Resort & Casino
hotel-3.shortDescription: At the heart of the Las Vegas Strip, ARIA Resort & Casino offers a luxurious resort experience with technologically advanced accommodations, world-class dining and entertainment, upscale shopping and more.
hotel-3.roomRatePlanDescription: Deluxe Queen Room - $120 Resort Credit Per Stay - RCJL17

hotel-4.name: The Palazzo Las Vegas
hotel-4.shortDescription: This luxurious resort and casino is on the Las Vegas Strip, connected to sister property The Venetian by walks and waterways. Downtown is 3 miles away and McCarran Airport is within 4 miles.

hotel-5.name: The Berkley Las Vegas
hotel-5.shortDescription: Located in Enterprise, this condo is within 6 mi (10 km) of Town Square Las Vegas, Bali Hai Golf Club, and Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign. Luxor Casino and T-Mobile Arena are also within 6 mi (10 km).

hotel-6.name: Mandalay Bay Resort And Casino
hotel-6.shortDescription: 3 miles from the airport, the 43-story Mandalay Bay Resort sits on 60 acres at the south end of the Strip; a complimentary monorail connects it to the Luxor and Excalibur hotels.
hotel-6.roomRatePlanDescription: Room, 2 Queen Beds (Resort) - $80 Resort Credit Per Stay - RCJL17

hotel-7.name: Vdara Hotel & Spa
hotel-7.shortDescription: This all-suite, smoke-free CityCenter resort is steps away from ARIA Resort and Casino, and connected to the Bellagio. The ARIA Express tram connects the property to other facilities within the complex.

hotel-8.name: MGM Grand Hotel & Casino
hotel-8.shortDescription: Located on the southern end of the famous Las Vegas Strip, this hotel is close to McCarran International Airport, Crystals at City Center, and the University of Nevada, Las Vegas.

hotel-9.name: Mirage Resort & Casino
hotel-9.shortDescription: The Mirage is a Las Vegas classic. A 54-foot-high volcano spews fire and steam nightly by the entrance to this Strip resort. Inside, Cirque Du Soleil celebrates the musical legacy of The Beatles through original recordings in their production of LOVE.
hotel-9.roomRatePlanDescription: Room, 1 King Bed (Resort) - $50 Resort Credit Per Stay - RCJL17

hotel-10.name: Encore at Wynn Las Vegas
hotel-10.shortDescription: Linked to flagship resort Wynn Las Vegas on the Las Vegas Strip, Encore is a distinct destination resort with its own repertoire of accommodations, culinary offerings, and leisure activities. The Fashion Show Mall is across the street.

hotel-11.name: SLS Las Vegas a Tribute Portfolio Resort
hotel-11.englishName: SLS Las Vegas a Tribute Portfolio Resort
hotel-11.shortDescription: Located in the heart of Las Vegas, this spa hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Chapel of the Flowers, Las Vegas Convention Center, and Fashion Show Mall. Las Vegas Premium Outlets is 1.8 mi (2.9 km) away.

hotel-12.name: TI - Treasure Island Hotel and Casino
hotel-12.englishName: TI - Treasure Island Hotel and Casino
hotel-12.shortDescription: Treasure Island - TI Hotel & Casino is connected to the Fashion Show shopping mall by bridge as well as The Mirage by tram, and within easy walking distance of Wynn/Encore, the Sands Expo, and Venetian/Palazzo.
hotel-12.roomRatePlanDescription: Run of the House Room - Save up to 30% + $150 Added Value

hotel-13.name: The Signature at MGM Grand
hotel-13.shortDescription: 3 miles from Las Vegas airport, The Signature's proximity to the heart of MGM Grand provides the best of both worlds! The hotel is directly connected to MGM Grand, the Entertainment Authority, with legendary shows, world-class dining, and unbeatable nightlife.

hotel-14.name: Trump International Hotel Las Vegas
hotel-14.shortDescription: Overlooking the Las Vegas skyline, this 64-story luxury resort stands adjacent to the Fashion Show Mall. It is a short cab ride to the Las Vegas Convention Center.

hotel-15.name: Wynn Las Vegas
hotel-15.shortDescription: Rising dramatically on the Las Vegas Strip, this bronze resort offers the height of luxury, entertainment and shopping.

hotel-16.name: Marriott's Grand Chateau
hotel-16.shortDescription: Located in Paradise, this eco-friendly condominium resort is within 2 mi (3 km) of Miracle Mile Shops, University of Nevada-Las Vegas, and Fashion Show Mall. Las Vegas Convention Center and Thomas and Mack Center are also within 3 mi (5 km).

hotel-17.name: Paris Las Vegas Resort & Casino
hotel-17.shortDescription: This Paris-themed hotel is 3 miles from the Las Vegas Convention Center and less than 5 miles from downtown. Guests enter through the Arc de Triomphe, star-gaze from atop the Eiffel Tower, and stroll past the Louvre.
hotel-17.roomRatePlanDescription: Red Room, 2 Queen Beds, Non Smoking, High Floor

hotel-18.name: Polo Towers by Diamond Resorts
hotel-18.shortDescription: Situated in the middle of the action and directly across the street from world class dining & shopping at CityCenter with Strip and mountain views; this non-gaming resort surrounds you with luxury & convenience

hotel-19.name: Excalibur Hotel Casino
hotel-19.shortDescription: Located at the southern end of the Las Vegas Strip and close to McCarran Airport, this castle-shaped hotel features royal accommodations and a traditional action-packed medieval dinner show.

hotel-20.name: Hard Rock Hotel & Casino
hotel-20.shortDescription: The Hard Rock, which contains a 5-acre water playground popular with the young and the hip, is within 2 miles of the Las Vegas Strip, Las Vegas Convention Center, and McCarran International Airport.

hotel-21.name: Desert Rose Resort
hotel-21.shortDescription: Offering comfortable suites with full kitchens, this non-gaming condo resort is 1.5 blocks from the Las Vegas Strip, within 3 miles of McCarran International Airport, and within 25 miles of Red Rock Canyon and the Hoover Dam.

hotel-22.name: Elara by Hilton Grand Vacations - Center Strip
hotel-22.englishName: Elara by Hilton Grand Vacations - Center Strip
hotel-22.shortDescription: Rising up over the center of the Strip, this sleek, 52-story hotel is adjacent to the Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino complex and offers direct access to the more-than-170 shops and restaurants of the Miracle Mile. The airport is 4 miles away.

hotel-23.name: Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino
hotel-23.shortDescription: Situated in the center of the Las Vegas Strip, Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino is within 2 miles of Fashion Show Mall and 4 miles of the convention center; it's 3 miles from the Las Vegas airport.
hotel-23.roomRatePlanDescription: Ultra Hip Room, 2 Queen Beds, Non Smoking (Newly Renovated)

hotel-24.name: Jewel Estates - Golf Cribs
hotel-24.shortDescription: Located in Tule Springs, this vacation home is 1.5 mi (2.4 km) from Floyd Lamb State Park and within 9 mi (15 km) of Las Vegas Paiute Golf Club Resort and Durango Hills Golf Club. Mountain View Hospital and Craig Ranch Regional Park are also within 12 mi (20 km).

hotel-25.name: Delano Las Vegas at Mandalay Bay
hotel-25.englishName: Delano Las Vegas at Mandalay Bay
hotel-25.shortDescription: Located within a private second tower of the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino complex, this hotel is right behind the Strip. Delano Las Vegas at Mandalay Bay shares amenities such as world-class dining and pool space. The entrance to the hotel is to the west of Mandalay Bay Resort off Las Vegas Boulevard and Luxor Drive.
hotel-25.roomRatePlanDescription: Suite, 2 Queen Beds (Delano) - $80 Resort Credit Per Stay - RCJL17

hotel-26.name: Monte Carlo Resort and Casino
hotel-26.shortDescription: Centrally located next to T-Mobile Arena and The Park. Connected to this Las Vegas hotel is Park Theater which features top performing music artists.

hotel-27.name: Platinum Hotel
hotel-27.shortDescription: This non-gaming and non-smoking all-suite Vegas resort presents a relaxing atmosphere with views of the Strip and mountains; the Strip is 1.5 blocks away; the Las Vegas Convention Center is less than 2 miles.

hotel-28.name: Golden Nugget Las Vegas Hotel & Casino
hotel-28.englishName: Golden Nugget Las Vegas Hotel & Casino
hotel-28.shortDescription: A storied name in Las Vegas, the downtown Golden Nugget Las Vegas Hotel & Casino is 2 miles north of the Strip; the Fremont Street Experience dazzles right outside, nightly.

hotel-29.name: Desert Paradise Resort by Diamond Resorts
hotel-29.englishName: Desert Paradise Resort by Diamond Resorts
hotel-29.shortDescription: Located in West of The Strip, this condominium resort is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Orleans Arena and within 3 mi (5 km) of Luxor Casino and The Park. Park Theater and T-Mobile Arena are also within 3 mi (5 km).
hotel-29.roomRatePlanDescription: Suite, 1 King Bed with Sofa bed (927 Sq Ft)

hotel-30.name: Luxor Hotel and Casino
hotel-30.shortDescription: With 2 22-story towers and an eye-catching 30-story pyramid topped by a powerful light beam, this resort is 2 miles from McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas.

hotel-31.name: Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas
hotel-31.shortDescription: Located on the Las Vegas Strip, the non-gaming Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas provides direct access to the adjacent Mandalay Bay Resort & Casino and to Las Vegas entertainment.

hotel-32.name: Flamingo Las Vegas - Hotel & Casino
hotel-32.shortDescription: The first casino hotel in Las Vegas, the Flamingo Las Vegas - Hotel & Casino anchors the famous four corners of Las Vegas Boulevard and Flamingo Road and welcomes families as well as high-rolling all-night partiers.
hotel-32.roomRatePlanDescription: FAB Deluxe Room, 2 Queen Beds, Non Smoking

hotel-33.name: The LINQ Hotel & Casino
hotel-33.shortDescription: Occupying a premium spot on the iconic Las Vegas Strip, this modern resort is a short stroll from the LINQ outdoor shopping promenade and the High Roller, the worlds tallest observation wheel.
hotel-33.roomRatePlanDescription: Deluxe Room, 2 Full Beds, Non Smoking

hotel-34.name: Bally's Las Vegas - Hotel & Casino
hotel-34.shortDescription: This Art Deco-style hotel is located on the Strip behind the Grand Bazaar Shops, a 2-acre shopping plaza with over 120 specialty stores and dining venues and is accessible via a moving sidewalk at the Heart of the Las Vegas Strip.
hotel-34.roomRatePlanDescription: Jubilee Room, 2 Queen Beds, Strip View, Smoking

hotel-35.name: Jet Luxury at the Vdara Condo Hotel
hotel-35.englishName: Jet Luxury at the Vdara Condo Hotel
hotel-35.shortDescription: Located in Paradise, this luxury hotel is 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Miracle Mile Shops and within 3 mi (5 km) of University of Nevada-Las Vegas and Las Vegas Convention Center. Fashion Show Mall and Thomas and Mack Center are also within 3 mi (5 km).

hotel-36.name: Circus Circus Hotel, Casino & Theme Park
hotel-36.englishName: Circus Circus Hotel, Casino & Theme Park
hotel-36.shortDescription: Iconic hotel located on the Las Vegas strip, Circus Circus is close to shopping, the Las Vegas Convention Center and downtown Las Vegas.

hotel-37.name: Tropicana Las Vegas - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
hotel-37.englishName: Tropicana Las Vegas - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
hotel-37.shortDescription: The South Beach-inspired Tropicana resort is  conveniently located just minutes from the airport, major convention centers, and top entertainment stadiums.

hotel-38.name: South Point Hotel, Casino, and Spa
hotel-38.englishName: South Point Hotel, Casino, and Spa
hotel-38.shortDescription: Opened in late 2005, this 25-story hotel and casino is just east of I-15, on the South Strip, 5 miles from the airport, and 9 miles from the Las Vegas Convention Center.

hotel-39.name: Downtown Grand Las Vegas
hotel-39.shortDescription: Located in Downtown Las Vegas, this hotel is 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Mob Museum and within 3 mi (5 km) of Las Vegas Convention Center and Las Vegas Premium Outlets. Las Vegas City Hall and Fremont Street Experience are also within 5 minutes.

hotel-40.name: The Palms Casino Resort
hotel-40.shortDescription: Comprising 40- and 55-story towers, Palms Casino Resort is 1 mile west of the Las Vegas Strip, 3 miles from the Forum Shops, and 5 miles from the convention center.

hotel-41.name: The Orleans Hotel & Casino
hotel-41.shortDescription: Located about 1 mile west of the glittering Las Vegas Strip, this family-friendly, French-Quarter-themed hotel offers spectacular views of the sweeping mountain panoramas surrounding the Las Vegas Valley.

hotel-42.name: Four Queens Hotel and Casino
hotel-42.shortDescription: Located 2 miles from the north end of the Strip, this downtown Las Vegas hotel opens directly onto Fremont Street's pedestrian mall, site of after-dark sound-and-light shows.
hotel-42.roomRatePlanDescription: North Tower Standard - Includes Fun Book! - No Resort Fee

hotel-43.name: Holiday Inn Club Vacations at Desert Club Resort
hotel-43.englishName: Holiday Inn Club Vacations at Desert Club Resort
hotel-43.shortDescription: This 19.5-acre gated community is 1 block from the Las Vegas Strip, 25 miles from Death Valley, and 17 miles from Red Rock Canyon.
hotel-43.roomRatePlanDescription: Standard Room, Non Smoking - Advance Purchase Offers

hotel-44.name: W Las Vegas
hotel-44.shortDescription: Situated in Las Vegas, this luxury hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Chapel of the Flowers, Las Vegas Convention Center, and Fashion Show Mall. Las Vegas Premium Outlets is 1.8 mi (2.9 km) away.

hotel-45.name: Rio All-Suite Hotel & Casino
hotel-45.shortDescription: Every room is a suite at the Rio! The Rio hosts more than 2,500 suites, providing spectacular views of Las Vegas. Complimentary shuttles whisk guests to the Strip, a mile away; Fashion Show Mall and the convention center are within 4 miles.
hotel-45.roomRatePlanDescription: Classic Suite, 2 Queen Beds, Smoking, Mountain View

hotel-46.name: Tuscany Suites & Casino
hotel-46.shortDescription: Set on 27 acres of lawns and winding paths, this all-suite resort is 3 blocks from the glitz of the Strip and less than 2 miles from the Las Vegas Convention Center. The resort is 2 miles from airport and 1 mile from shopping district.

hotel-47.name: Harrah's Hotel and Casino Las Vegas
hotel-47.englishName: Harrah's Hotel and Casino Las Vegas
hotel-47.shortDescription: One of 7 stops on the Monorail line, this famed, 2,579-room hotel is in the midst of Strip activity. It is 1 mile from Fashion Show Mall and less than 3 miles from the Las Vegas Convention Center.
hotel-47.roomRatePlanDescription: Mardi Gras Room, 2 Queen Beds, Non Smoking

hotel-48.name: Tahiti Village Resort & Spa
hotel-48.shortDescription: This all-suite Las Vegas resort and spa offers complimentary shuttle service to casinos and local shopping areas. The hotel boasts an onsite Lazy River.

hotel-49.name: Hilton Grand Vacations on the Las Vegas Strip
hotel-49.englishName: Hilton Grand Vacations on the Las Vegas Strip
hotel-49.shortDescription: Located amid the continuous action on the Las Vegas Strip, this newly renovated, non-gaming Hilton is on the north end of The Strip, a mile from the convention center and close to casinos.
